response.overview: Rashid Ait Daoud is a Moroccan film director and producer, born on February 2, 1990, in Tattiwin, Midelt. He has directed and produced several notable television and documentary works, including the 10-episode series "Journey of Moroccan Calligraphy" (Al Aoula), the 40-episode series "Story of a Place", the educational program "Read and Learn", and "Kingdom of Saints" (Channel 6). His work also includes producing the series "Ana Wiyak Maâ Iman" and directing the documentary films "Abu Salem Al-Ayashi", "Tattiwin", and "Sources of Tattiwin".
response.title: RASHID AIT DAOUD

results.name: Mr. Ait Daoud Rashid Curriculum vitæ  رشيد أيت داوود
